mapper.select: select notice_idx, notice_title, date_format(notice_created_time, '%Y.%m.%d' ) as notice_created_time from notice where notice_deleted = 'N';
select notice_idx, notice_title, notice_content, date_format(notice_created_time, '%Y.%m.%d' ) as notice_created_time from notice where notice_deleted = 'N' and notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}
mapper.delete: update notice set notice_deleted = 'Y', user_id = 'Test' where notice_idx = #{noticeIdx}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_updated_time = now(), user_id = 'Test' where notice_idx = #{noticeIdx}
